评论详情: So difficult to find clothes at 5’0. This fit great!  Just pull pants top up if you want to cover whole stomach. Length is good for a low or high heel. Comfortable, fabric breathes. So pleased I bought four in different colors. I’m hoping they make one with long sleeves , crew neck for fall. I almost didn’t want to leave a review because I may get more and don’t want them to run out of XS. I am 54 and weigh 114-119 depending on the day. Fabric is not see through, thank Goodness!  Could dress up or down. Super pleased with colors! Well made. Not flimsy. Does not look cheap like other brands. 5 stars all the way.

My absolute most favorite material. It’s stretchy and soft. Very flattering. I look for this style in material in every shirt I buy now and it’s a bonus that it’s a set. The best quality honestly and so worth the money

the color is a perfect grey and the material is super comfortable and stretchy. The only reason I took a star off is because the shirt, (which i wear separately all the time) fits great up top but then flairs a little towards my stomach / waist. It is not form fitting towards the bottom which I personally just don’t like the flared look for a top and the pants are a little short. I am 5’6 but am taller in my torso and not so much in my legs and it still kinda rises at an awkward length. I wear the bottoms around the house so it does not matter anyways. It is very comfy and worth the price!

评论概述: please read review -they’re okay don’t believe the hype
评论详情: I bought these because of all the great reviews I read ;however, I can’t relate with the hype on here. I am 5’4 weigh 160lbs, I ordered a size medium and the bottoms fit too short on me. I will definitely agree that the fabric feels very nice but it faded after one wash. In my opinion not worth the price. These should be price down a little bit.
Love the fabric and the fit. Very cute to lounge in or go out. Also this is one of my favorite basic tees in my collection now

The material is super stretchy and soft. I am 5”3 and the length is perfect for me but if you are taller or have long legs depending how high you pull the waste up , they might be short. I ordered a small and it fit really good. For reference I weigh 160lbs and I usually range from a size 4-6 depending on the material of the bottoms. As for bra size I wear DD36.  Don’t walk ,run to order it !
This set is fine if you’re okay with it being see through and wearing it only at home. I’m 5’8” and the pants were not long enough at all. Disappointed

评论概述: An easy set to wear all day long!
评论详情: I absolutely love my light blue two-piece lounge set! The color is beautiful—a soft, calming shade of blue that’s perfect for relaxing at home. The fabric is incredibly soft and lightweight, making it ideal for lounging around or even wearing to bed. The design is simple but stylish enough that I can wear it both indoors and out for casual errands. It’s become my go-to for travel. Highly recommend if you’re looking for comfort and style!
I loveee this set i got it in both pink and black, it’s very stretchy i even sized down and i felt that i could’ve went down a size or two :), im 5’5 and it was right at my ankles
I’m 5’2” and it’s not super long on me. They are really soft. The only downside is that they do have a seam going down your crotch so if you don’t adjust properly, you will get a camel toe.
Perfect fit, and comfortable can wear outside or inside great for travel

I bought this set in blue, super cute. It’s a stretchy material, I’m about 5’4, 125lbs, 32B cup size, 39inch hips, and a 27inch waist. I purchased a size small. This set is the perfect length for me. Not tall girl friendly, if you are taller than me you will be flooding badly. Please be aware when you buy this set, as others have previously mentioned the moment you wash it the color will fade. I washed it once on warm and dried on low. It is now discolored and splotchy in certain areas. Hand wash or wash on cold and air dry or do low heat. Despite this it’s still a really cute set and the scrunched fold over waistband is adorable, it’s also very flattering.
Super nice material ! Fits just right!
10/10. Get this set. I’m 5’2 about 190 I got a L, fits perfectly!! Not see through and great quality of clothing

this top is so cute n soft and the material is really cozy, but as a tall(ish) girl (5’6.5”) these pants were too short on me and had to return :( if they were longer i absolutely would have kept them !

I loveee this set! I’m pleasantly surprised that it fit me because I ordered a small. The material isn’t super thin and the fold over band is a bit thick if you like a bit of tummy control. I’m a 36 D, so I was nervous that the top would be too tight, but it’s stretchy enough withougjt looking baggy! I’m literally gonna order another color lol
does shrink a bit after washing
For a short girl with a sensitive tummy, these leggings don't press in and are so comfy. Going to buy another one. The length is good for me and I'm 5'2", so just know it runs short.
Comfy But runs a little big in my opinion. Size 8 and ordered a medium and it’s seems a little bit too loose
Snagged pretty easily and I wouldn’t wear the shirt without the pants I’m not crazy about the cut but the pants are great.
My daughter loved it! She has paired it with some converse and Sambas and it’s adorable! Comfortable set, true to size. She’s 5’5”, 126lbs  and I bought a small

I really like this but it’s also not my favorite. I like the material and the fit is okay, it’s not see through thankfully and the fabric is soft too. I just don’t think this necessarily suits my body type but it’s still cute and I do like it.
If it was spring time instead of fall time, I would have kept it. But I now desire to be warm, so I returned it. The fit was perfect and looked great.

Material was nice, sizing was accurate, but its not short girl friendly. Was bummed out because I wanted to get more now I have to keep looking for the right set.

Honestly super cute and stretchy but I downsized to xs and I'm more of a smedium. I should have went with small because the xs was tight on my hips and dented them in. The top was cute and stretchy, not cropped either but I'm 5'2. I'd repurchase in small! I'm 5'2 and 120pounds.

I love the material pants run a lil big though.

This set is sooo good!! I love it so much. It’s such a good quality and not made cheap. I plan on buying another one because I love my first one that much.

I normally don't leave reviews but I'm obsessed with this! I'm 5'2 with short legs and my yoga pants are always touching the ground but this is a great fit. I wear a size 16 pants and the XL fit great. Just ordered in more colors

These are really really comfy. They're warm but not hot, so great for most weather. I usually order up in size, because I mean more toward frumpy than tight. With these, I don't recommend that. You can easily go your normal US size, if not a size down. They weren't baggy, because they're stretchy, but let's just say they weren't very flattering accenting my regular shape. Nice cotton like material and very comfortable. The bottom runs a little big for me. Gapping in the crotch area, but fine in the back. The waist is faux fold-over and not an actual fold-over.

评论概述: Love this set. Will buy another

This set is super soft, very stretchy and comfortable. These pajamas fit true to size. They feel soft and look like the product pictures in person. They are a tight fit and will show your belly at least a bit, so be aware of that if that isn't something  you are looking for.
